# Infy Galaxy - Free OCR Tool

Free, high-accuracy OCR for converting images and PDFs to text.

## Core Pages
- [OCR Tool](https://www.ocr-extraction.com/): The main extraction interface.
- [Blog](https://www.ocr-extraction.com/blog): Articles and updates on OCR technology.
- [About Us](https://www.ocr-extraction.com/about): Our mission and technology stack.

## Technical Details
- **Max File Size**: 10MB total daily quota for users.
- **Supported Formats**: PDF, PNG, JPG, JPEG, WEBP, SVG.
- **Processing Engine**: Advanced AI Models (PDFs) and Cloud Vision (Images).
- **Hosting**: Migrating to Hostinger for improved performance and scalability.
